subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|alt1=扌|t1=hand|召|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to beckon with the hand.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[beckon]]
# to [[recruit]]
# classifier for moves or blows (especially in martial arts)
# to confess
